title: Pressure builds as Shanghai, a city of 25 million, remains locked inside - CNN
content:
1. Pressure builds as Shanghai, a city of 25 million, remains locked inside  CNN
  2. Shanghai lockdown: What could China's zero Covid policy mean for the world economy? - BBC Newsnight  BBC News
  3. Shanghai residents protest strict COVID lockdown  CBS News
  4. Lockdown Anger in Shanghai Won't Fade Anytime Soon  Bloomberg
  5. 'We are starving': Shanghai residents protest largest Covid lockdown in the world  CNN
  6. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Shanghai is at the center of China's efforts to stamp out the country's largest outbreak of Covid since the start of the pandemic more than two years ago. No one is allowed to leave their residential compounds, even to buy food, and that's creating huge pressure on the system.
